templates.name: Will I get notified when you receive my return/refund?
templates.content: Once your return is received at our warehouse and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund. If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment.

templates.name: Holiday Return Policy
templates.content:
Beginning November 1, we will extend the return/exchange window to 60 days from purchase to allow for holiday gift-giving. When checking out with an order, you have the option to check out with our returns and package protection benefits. This qualifies you for unlimited free return shipping labels on that order in addition to package protection against lost or damaged items.

For customers that opt-out of the benefit, you are able to proceed with a return through our portal, but will be responsible for the $6.99 return shipping label cost.

templates.name: Return label
templates.content: Please go to our returns center at https://bl101.attn.tv/avOTawUuILPj to set up the return/exchange. Once the form is completed, a prepaid return label will be sent to you via email.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at info@bl101.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://www.bl101.com/pages/baseball-lifestyle-101-rewards#smile-home

templates.name: Cancel /edit order
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please email your request to info@bl101.com or feel free to call this number (631-649-7133. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!

templates.name: Dimensions of Original Bat Cross Pendant
templates.content: The dimensions of our original bat cross are 1.5' in length, 0.9' in width, and 0.23' in depth.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/baseball_lifestyle101/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/BaseballLifestyle101/

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can check our locations here - https://www.bl101.com/pages/official-retailers

templates.name: What if my package is lost or stolen?
templates.content: We're now offering shipping insurance through Route. It only costs 1% of your total order amount, and if a package is lost or stolen, simply open a claim through the email sent separately from your order confirmation, and you'll have your order replaced within 48h.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! Our clothes generally run true to size. What do you usually wear?

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at info@bl101.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at info@bl101.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $150. Maybe you can add something else to reach the min?

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Can the items be customized?
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't offer customization. I really appreciate your patience and understanding on this!

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: We allow for free returns and exchanges within 30 days of the purchase. You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.bl101.com/pages/refund-policy and you can start your return here: https://www.bl101.com/a/service

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.bl101.com/collections/sale

templates.name: When will my order be ready for pickup?
templates.content: Orders will be ready for pickup within 3 business days. When your order is ready, you will receive a "Ready for Pickup" email to the email you used to place your order.

templates.name: Can I return an item bought online to the store?
templates.content: If you purchased an item from BL101.com, you can exchange this at one of our retail locations. Please note, that it can NOT be returned at Dick's Sporting Goods or Academy Sports, only one of our branded locations.

templates.name: How can I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://www.bl101.com/apps/redo/returns-portal/login

templates.name: Restock button
templates.content: I'm sorry, I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend signing up on the product page so you're notified the second it comes back in! The "Notify me when available" feature is accessible on the far left of the product page. What do you think about this instead? -

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: After your payment is verified, it will take an average of 5-7 business days for your order to be shipped. We usually ship via USPS or UPS, and we do our best to ship all orders as quickly as we can. Business Days are considered Monday through Friday, from 9 am to 5 pm EST. From there, shipping time will vary based off the shipping speed chosen at checkout.

templates.name: How do I spend my reward points?
templates.content: You can redeem your points directly on the Baseball Lifestyle 101 Rewards page here: https://www.bl101.com/pages/rewards , by clicking on the 'redeem' button and pasting the given code at checkout, or by selecting a reward directly in your cart. Reward codes will also be delivered via email after redemption.

templates.name: How will I receive the gift card that I purchased?
templates.content: Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees. They will be issued electronically to the email address entered at checkout. Please check your spam and promo folders as sometimes our emails end up there.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call Monday-Friday between 9am and 4pm EST at 631-649-7133 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster :)

templates.name: Post Purchase Inquiries
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please email your request to info@bl101.com or feel free to call this number 631-649-7133. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!
